item.title: Parrhasius
item.description: One day I found myself scrolling through internet best source of wallpapers and found myself wishing for something to mass-download a whole thread. Without a proper google search even, decided to write something on my own. Presto! A new project. Part 1: Good beginnings The basic part is easy enough: use Nokogiri in Ruby to parse site HTML, extract image URLs: html = Nokogiri(open(link).read) html.search('a') .select { |l| l.children.size == 1 && l.
